About.subtitle: Biography
About.title: Beyond the Code
About.description:
Hello! I'm Franck Andritina, a Web Developer who believes that building great software is as much about human connection as it is about syntax.

My approach goes beyond just writing lines of code. I focus on software craftsmanshipâ€”ensuring every solution is scalable, maintainable, and high-performing. For me, quality isn't an afterthought; it's the foundation of the entire development process.

I thrive in collaborative environments. Whether it's leading a project, participating in code reviews, or brainstorming with a team, I leverage my soft skills and Agile management experience to bridge the gap between technical requirements and business goals.

Services.subtitle: Specialized Solutions
Services.title: Crafting Digital Excellence
Services.description: Beyond just writing code, I build scalable digital ecosystems. From architecting robust backends to designing immersive user experiences, I focus on delivering high-performance solutions tailored to your unique vision.
